short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A prompt to journal your thoughts at unexpected times of the week

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever wanted to keep a diary, but never found the time to write in one? Well now, the diary finds time for you! Random Access Memories is a popup that comes up at randomly set intervals throughout the week for you to reflect and write upon.
